QuestData.Title: Last Meal
QuestData.Description: I'm not dumb, $n. I know what's ahead of us.$B$BOur people are going to go through those gates and fight against an enemy that is better trained, has more numbers and better weapons than us.$B$BEven if we succeed, it'll be at a great cost. For most of us, today's meal will be the last.$B$BI cannot fight, but I sure can cook. Bring me meat from the stags that roam this area and I will ensure that the last meal these folks get will be their best.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you get what I needed, $N?
QuestData.RewardText: I thank you, $n. Our men and women will have a last good meal before they set off for battle.
